description: A landowner has made an "unreasonable" request to force the removal of equipment, the company says.
title: Sark Electricity 'forced' to disconnect 19 homes over equipment dispute
title_page: Sark Electricity 'forced' to disconnect 19 homes over equipment dispute - BBC News
maintext: Mr Jackson said: "How does a landowner have the right to determine who can and who cannot have power on Sark?
